problem.markdown:
1. Principle behind the working of venturimeter is?
() Newtons law () Stokes law (x) Bernoullis principle
2. For a venturimeter, if you plot log( flow rate) vs log(pressure drop),the slope of the straight line is?
() 0.2 () 2 (x) 0.5 () 5
3. -------------------- is the characteristic of a venturimeter.
() Nozzle () vena contracta (x) throat () a concentric hole
4. Pressure recovery takes place in ---------------of the venturimeter
(x) throat () converging section () diverging section () All
5. Around -----------% of pressure is recovered in venturimeter.
(x) 90% () 60% () 40% () 10%
problem.p: 1. Principle behind the working of venturimeter is?
2. For a venturimeter, if you plot log( flow rate) vs log(pressure drop),the slope of the straight line is?
3. -------------------- is the characteristic of a venturimeter.
4. Pressure recovery takes place in ---------------of the venturimeter
5. Around -----------% of pressure is recovered in venturimeter.
